p: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) recommends neutral soap and sodium hypochlorite 0.1% to clean equipment or ethanol (70% concentration) if specific formulations are lacking [ 19]. In the UK, PHE recommends patient care equipment should be cleaned where possible with chlorine-based disinfectant, 70% alcohol or an alternative disinfectant used within the organisation that is effective against enveloped viruses [ 11].
